title: 'The Great Reset' Goes Local | Guest: Dr. Robert Epstein | 1/21/22
description:
Glenn and Stu start the show discussing the latest in companies going woke, including Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue, M&Ms, and Carhartt, which is perfectly in line with the Great Reset. Glenn and Stu discuss how America has gone away from products lasting decades and how quality has declined. Glenn’s book “The Great Reset” has already sold out of its second printing, so Glenn announces his intent to localize his book production and market. If you want to change something, believe in yourself and the power of freedom. Dr. Robert Epstein joins Glenn to discuss Google and YouTube, how they manipulate their users, and how to fight the manipulation.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
